R5: executed_by('conduct customer identification & legitimation', 'customer advisor') and executed_by('legitimiation of suspected customer', 'money laundering officer')
R6: precedence('conclude custody account', 'conduct customer identification & legitimation') or precedence('conclude custody account', 'legitimation of suspected customer') and executed_by('conclude custody account', 'customer advisor') and condition_eventually_follows('data.customer_status == "untrusted"', 'legitimation of suspected customer')
